name: General Power of Attorney
description: General power of attorney document granting legal authority to an agent

sections.title: POWER OF ATTORNEY
sections.content: I, {grantor_name}, residing at {grantor_address} ('Principal'), hereby appoint {agent_name}, residing at {agent_address} ('Agent'), as my Attorney-in-Fact ('Agent').

sections.title: 1. GRANT OF AUTHORITY
sections.content: I hereby grant to my Agent full power and authority to act on my behalf and in my name in any way I could act in person with respect to the following matters, as each of them is defined in state law, to the extent that I am permitted by law to act through an Agent: {powers_granted}

sections.title: 2. EFFECTIVE DATE
sections.content: This Power of Attorney shall become effective on {effective_date}.

sections.title: 3. EXPIRATION
sections.content: This Power of Attorney shall expire on {expiration_date} unless revoked earlier by the Principal.

sections.title: 4. LIMITATIONS
sections.content: The powers granted to the Agent are subject to the following limitations: {limitations}

sections.title: 5. SUCCESSOR AGENT
sections.content: If {agent_name} is unable or unwilling to serve as my Agent, I appoint {successor_agent} as my successor Agent.

sections.title: 7. RELIANCE ON THIS POWER OF ATTORNEY
sections.content: Any person, including my Agent, may rely upon this Power of Attorney unless that person has actual knowledge that this Power of Attorney has been terminated or is invalid.
